name: 2048 For Money
description:
Inspired by Gabriele Cirulli game available on the web: http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/

Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

QUICK AND EASY CASHOUTS
Thousands of customers around the world use us for one simple reason: it’s simple. Just an email address and password will get you through to deposit and cashout

REAL MONEY
Play for cash prizes against other players around the world. If you are 18+, then you are eligible to play in the exciting real money cash games and tournaments that we host.

PLAY MONEY
Unique fun mode available! Free coins daily. Collect your bonus every day. Have fun and play for Free with no registration required. Enjoy beating your friends while increasing your viral balance!

WORLDWIDE PLAY
Play immediately against players from all over the world. Start playing now on the only real money mobile 2048 community on the net!

BEAUTIFUL AND UNIQUE BOARD
A chic and classy design. The beauty and power of 2048 for Money is in your hand. Designed for iPhone and iPad.

SAFE AND SECURE
Our GamyTech security team uses sophisticated software and monitoring techniques to ensure that proper security is maintained at all times.

QUICK AND EASY CASHOUTS
Thousands of customers around the world use us for one simple reason: it’s simple. Just an email address and password will get you through to deposit and cashout.

VISA, MASTER CARD AND PAYPAL
Secured online payment service from our game that lets you cash-in securely online with your existing Credit Card or Paypal Account. This service through a simple checkout process, confirms your identity when you make a deposit in one of our games.

Apple is not a sponsor or involved in the contests offered by the application
